Title: Prohibits the eviction of small commercial tenants in the city of New York without good cause
Summary: Prohibits the eviction of small commercial tenants in the city of New York without good cause.
LawCode: Add Title 22 Chap 12 §§22-1201 - 22-1206, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the eviction of small commercial tenants in the city of New York without good cause
